members.member:
扩展的窗口风格 这是 long 类型的，如果想要使用 int 类型请使用 类
代码：[Extended Window Styles (Windows)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ff700543(v=vs.85).aspx ) code from [Extended Window Styles (Windows)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ff700543(v=vs.85).aspx )

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_ACCEPTFILES
member.summary: The window accepts drag-drop files

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_APPWINDOW
member.summary: Forces a top-level window onto the taskbar when the window is visible

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_CLIENTEDGE
member.summary: The window has a border with a sunken edge.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_COMPOSITED
member.summary: Paints all descendants of a window in bottom-to-top painting order using double-buffering. For more information, see Remarks. This cannot be used if the window has a class style of either CS_OWNDC or CS_CLASSDC.Windows 2000: This style is not supported.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_CONTEXTHELP
member.summary: The title bar of the window includes a question mark. When the user clicks the question mark, the cursor changes to a question mark with a pointer. If the user then clicks a child window, the child receives a WM_HELP message. The child window should pass the message to the parent window procedure, which should call the WinHelp function using the HELP_WM_HELP command. The Help application displays a pop-up window that typically contains help for the child window.WS_EX_CONTEXTHELP cannot be used with the WS_MAXIMIZEBOX or WS_MINIMIZEBOX styles.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_CONTROLPARENT
member.summary: The window itself contains child windows that should take part in dialog box navigation. If this style is specified, the dialog manager recurses into children of this window when performing navigation operations such as handling the TAB key, an arrow key, or a keyboard mnemonic.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_DLGMODALFRAME
member.summary: The window has a double border; the window can, optionally, be created with a title bar by specifying the WS_CAPTION style in the dwStyle parameter.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_LAYERED
member.summary: The window is a layered window. This style cannot be used if the window has a class style of either CS_OWNDC or CS_CLASSDC.Windows 8: The WS_EX_LAYERED style is supported for top-level windows and child windows. Previous Windows versions support WS_EX_LAYERED only for top-level windows.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_LAYOUTRTL
member.summary: If the shell language is Hebrew, Arabic, or another language that supports reading order alignment, the horizontal origin of the window is on the right edge. Increasing horizontal values advance to the left.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_LEFT
member.summary: The window has generic left-aligned properties. This is the default.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_LEFTSCROLLBAR
member.summary: If the shell language is Hebrew, Arabic, or another language that supports reading order alignment, the vertical scroll bar (if present) is to the left of the client area. For other languages, the style is ignored.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_LTRREADING
member.summary: The window text is displayed using left-to-right reading-order properties. This is the default.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_MDICHILD
member.summary: The window is a MDI child window.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_NOACTIVATE
member.summary: A top-level window created with this style does not become the foreground window when the user clicks it. The system does not bring this window to the foreground when the user minimizes or closes the foreground window.To activate the window, use the SetActiveWindow or SetForegroundWindow function.The window does not appear on the taskbar by default. To force the window to appear on the taskbar, use the WS_EX_APPWINDOW style.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_NOINHERITLAYOUT
member.summary: The window does not pass its window layout to its child windows.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_NOPARENTNOTIFY
member.summary: The child window created with this style does not send the WM_PARENTNOTIFY message to its parent window when it is created or destroyed.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_NOREDIRECTIONBITMAP
member.summary: The window does not render to a redirection surface. This is for windows that do not have visible content or that use mechanisms other than surfaces to provide their visual.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_OVERLAPPEDWINDOW
member.summary: The window is an overlapped window.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_PALETTEWINDOW
member.summary: The window is palette window, which is a modeless dialog box that presents an array of commands.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_RIGHT
member.summary: The window has generic "right-aligned" properties. This depends on the window class. This style has an effect only if the shell language is Hebrew, Arabic, or another language that supports reading-order alignment; otherwise, the style is ignored.Using the WS_EX_RIGHT style for static or edit controls has the same effect as using the SS_RIGHT or ES_RIGHT style, respectively. Using this style with button controls has the same effect as using BS_RIGHT and BS_RIGHTBUTTON styles.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_RIGHTSCROLLBAR
member.summary: The vertical scroll bar (if present) is to the right of the client area. This is the default.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_RTLREADING
member.summary: If the shell language is Hebrew, Arabic, or another language that supports reading-order alignment, the window text is displayed using right-to-left reading-order properties. For other languages, the style is ignored.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_STATICEDGE
member.summary: The window has a three-dimensional border style intended to be used for items that do not accept user input.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_TOOLWINDOW
member.summary: The window is intended to be used as a floating toolbar. A tool window has a title bar that is shorter than a normal title bar, and the window title is drawn using a smaller font. A tool window does not appear in the taskbar or in the dialog that appears when the user presses ALT+TAB. If a tool window has a system menu, its icon is not displayed on the title bar. However, you can display the system menu by right-clicking or by typing ALT+SPACE.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_TOPMOST
member.summary: The window should be placed above all non-topmost windows and should stay above them, even when the window is deactivated. To add or remove this style, use the SetWindowPos function.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_TRANSPARENT
member.summary: The window should not be painted until siblings beneath the window (that were created by the same thread) have been painted. The window appears transparent because the bits of underlying sibling windows have already been painted.To achieve transparency without these restrictions, use the SetWindowRgn function.

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.ExtendedWindowStyles.WS_EX_WINDOWEDGE
member.summary: The window has a border with a raised edge

member.name: M:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.User32.SetWindowLongPtr(System.IntPtr,CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.GetWindowLongFields,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: 改变指定窗口的属性
member.param: 指定将设定的大于等于0的偏移值。有效值的范围从0到额外类的存储空间的字节数减4：例如若指定了12或多于12个字节的额外窗口存储空间，则应设索引位8来访问第三个4字节，同样设置0访问第一个4字节，4访问第二个4字节。要设置其他任何值，可以指定下面值之一 从 GetWindowLongFields 可以找到所有的值

member.name: M:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.User32.SetWindowLongPtr(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: 改变指定窗口的属性
member.param:
指定将设定的大于等于0的偏移值。有效值的范围从0到额外类的存储空间的字节数减4：例如若指定了12或多于12个字节的额外窗口存储空间，则应设索引位8来访问第三个4字节，同样设置0访问第一个4字节，4访问第二个4字节。要设置其他任何值，可以指定下面值之一 从 GetWindowLongFields 可以找到所有的值
GetWindowLongFields.GWL_EXSTYLE -20 设定一个新的扩展风格。
GWL_HINSTANCE -6 设置一个新的应用程序实例句柄。
GWL_ID -12 设置一个新的窗口标识符。
GWL_STYLE -16 设定一个新的窗口风格。
GWL_USERDATA -21 设置与窗口有关的32位值。每个窗口均有一个由创建该窗口的应用程序使用的32位值。
GWL_WNDPROC -4 为窗口设定一个新的处理函数。
GWL_HWNDPARENT -8 改变子窗口的父窗口,应使用SetParent函数

member.name: M:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.User32.SetWindowLong(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: 改变指定窗口的属性
member.param:
指定将设定的大于等于0的偏移值。有效值的范围从0到额外类的存储空间的字节数减4：例如若指定了12或多于12个字节的额外窗口存储空间，则应设索引位8来访问第三个4字节，同样设置0访问第一个4字节，4访问第二个4字节。要设置其他任何值，可以指定下面值之一 从 GetWindowLongFields 可以找到所有的值
GetWindowLongFields.GWL_EXSTYLE -20 设定一个新的扩展风格。
GWL_HINSTANCE -6 设置一个新的应用程序实例句柄。
GWL_ID -12 设置一个新的窗口标识符。
GWL_STYLE -16 设定一个新的窗口风格。
GWL_USERDATA -21 设置与窗口有关的32位值。每个窗口均有一个由创建该窗口的应用程序使用的32位值。
GWL_WNDPROC -4 为窗口设定一个新的处理函数。
GWL_HWNDPARENT -8 改变子窗口的父窗口,应使用SetParent函数

member.name: F:CustomMacroBase.Helper.Win32_Ex_Transparency.GetWindowLongFields.GWL_WNDPROC
member.summary: 为窗口设定一个新的处理函数 Retrieves the address of the window procedure, or a handle representing the address of the window procedure. You must use the CallWindowProc function to call the window procedure

member.summary: 获取虚拟手柄按键状态

summary.para: 通过反射更新虚拟手柄按键状态
通过反射更新虚拟手柄按键状态
通过反射获取虚拟手柄按键状态
范围找色_new
参数 color： 类型，匹配的颜色（比如填'0xFF0000'意为待查找颜色为红色）
参数 rect：? 类型，描述匹配范围的矩形（比如填'new(10, 20, 30, 40)'意为将范围限定在'x=10,y=20,width=30,height=40'的矩形内，填'null'默认全图）
参数 tolerance：? 类型，匹配的容差（比如填'20'意为被对比的两个颜色之间RGB分量差值允许浮动±20，填'null'默认20）
参数 flag： 类型，是否获取最新画面（比如填'false'意为不获取新截图而是采用旧的截图进行找色）
返回值： 类型，匹配到的颜色数量
范围找图
参数 bitmap：类型，匹配的小图
参数 rect：? 类型，描述匹配范围的矩形（比如填'new(10, 20, 30, 40)'意为将范围限定在'x=10,y=20,width=30,height=40'的矩形内，填'null'默认全图）
参数 tolerance：? 类型，匹配的相似度（范围0~1，比如填'null'意为使用默认值0.8）
参数 flag： 类型，是否获取最新画面（比如填'true'意为先获取新截图再进行找图）
返回值：? 类型，匹配成功返矩形左上角坐标，匹配失败返回null
范围找图
参数 path： 类型，匹配的小图的绝对路径
参数 rect：? 类型，描述匹配范围的矩形（比如填'new(10, 20, 30, 40)'意为将范围限定在'x=10,y=20,width=30,height=40'的矩形内，填'null'默认全图）
参数 tolerance：? 类型，相似度（范围0~1，比如填'null'意为使用默认值0.8）
参数 flag： 类型，是否获取最新画面（比如填'false'意为不获取新截图而是采用旧的截图进行找图）
返回值：? 类型，匹配成功返矩形左上角坐标，匹配失败返回null
范围找字（仅限数字0~9）
参数 rect： 类型，描述查找范围的矩形（比如填'new(10, 20, 30, 40)'意为将范围限定在'x=10,y=20,width=30,height=40'的矩形内）
参数 zoomratio： 类型，缩放比例（比如填'2'意为宽高均拉伸至原来的2倍）
参数 flag： 类型，是否获取最新画面（比如填'false'意为不获取新截图而是采用旧的截图进行找字）
返回值： 类型，识别成功返回字符串，识别失败返回空字符串
范围找字
参数 rect： 类型，描述查找范围的矩形（比如填'new(10, 20, 30, 40)'意为将范围限定在'x=10,y=20,width=30,height=40'的矩形内）
参数 iswhitetext： 类型，指定是否黑底白字（比如填'false'意为传入图像为白底黑字）
参数 language： 类型，指定语言（比如填'eng'、"jpn"，需在~/tessdata文件夹内存在对应训练数据）
参数 whitelist： 类型，指定白名单（比如填'abcd'意为只查找这几个字母，填null或空文本则意为不使用白名单）
参数 zoomratio： 类型，缩放比例（比如填'2'意为宽高均拉伸至原来的2倍）
参数 flag： 类型，是否获取最新画面（比如填'false'意为不获取新截图而是采用旧的截图进行找字）
返回值： 类型，识别成功返回字符串，识别失败返回空字符串
范围找字
参数 rect： 类型，描述查找范围的矩形（比如填'new(10, 20, 30, 40)'意为将范围限定在'x=10,y=20,width=30,height=40'的矩形内）
参数 language： 类型，指定语言（比如填'eng'、"jpn"，需在~/tessdata文件夹内存在对应训练数据）
参数 whitelist： 类型，指定白名单（比如填'abcd'意为只查找这几个字母，填null或空文本则意为不使用白名单）
参数 zoomratio： 类型，缩放比例（比如填'2'意为宽高均拉伸至原来的2倍）
参数 flag： 类型，是否获取最新画面（比如填'false'意为不获取新截图而是采用旧的截图进行找字）
返回值： 类型，识别成功返回字符串，识别失败返回空字符串
打印文本
顶层开关
按钮文本，默认值为类名
按钮选中状态

member.name: M:CustomMacroBase.MacroBase.UpdateEntry(CustomMacroBase.GamePadState.DS4StateLite@,CustomMacroBase.GamePadState.DS4StateLite@)
member.summary: 入口

summary.para: 该方法将于轮询中反复被执行
于该方法中监听 RealDS4 并操作 VirtualDS4 以实现自定义脚本
轮询频率设置为250Hz/500Hz/1000Hz时，理论上该方法每秒被执行250次/500次/1000次
该方法将于本类被实例化时执行一次
于该方法中操作 MainGate.Children 以实现往UI上放置默认滑块开关
